pageContext.claim: “General Motors is very counter to what other auto, and other, companies are doing. Big Steel is opening and renovating plants all over the country. Auto companies are pouring into the U.S., including BMW, which just announced a major new plant. The U.S.A. is booming!”
pageContext.analysis: There are a few steel plants that are either opening or renovating, but "all over the country" is a stretch. And BMW is considering a new plant, but it is far from a done deal as Trump suggests.
